Articles.Content:
I'm a new streamer with a pretty decent Space Shuttle, that i'll be using in accordance with my Proton replica to build the ISS just as it was built.  Including accurate docking, arm maneuvers, station function and station IVA's!  This is why I made the shuttle, after all.  Day 2, lets do this!

 

http://twitch.tv/spitfireacademy
I am quite interested in this!  Will be watching this!
Took some time out to add new shuttle parts I found, will be posting more on it soon.  Resuming this week.  M-F
